title: Correction to: Stop and go signals at the stigma–pollen interface of the Brassicaceae
content: This is a correction to: June B Nasrallah, Stop and go signals at the stigma–pollen interface of the Brassicaceae, Plant Physiology, Volume 193, Issue 2, October 2023, Pages 927–948, https://doi.org/10.1093/plphys/kiad301
